Key.markdownDescription:

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s._:/=+@-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: Yes  
Type: String
